name: LipidPanel_Event_CPT
title: Lipid Panel_Event_CPT
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Lipid Panel Event.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Lipid Panel Event for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: Lipid Panel Event for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Lipid Panel Codes that constitute the Lipid Panel Event for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Lipid panel results documented and reviewed (must include total cholesterol, HDL-C, triglycerides and calculated LDL-C) (CAD)
Lipid panel This panel must include the following: Cholesterol, serum, total (82465) Lipoprotein, direct measurement, high density cholesterol (HDL cholesterol) (83718) Triglycerides (84478)
